thread.title: Bacon poses same cancer risk as cigarettes, world health group... | www.ajc.com
thread.title_full: Bacon poses same cancer risk as cigarettes, world health group... | www.ajc.com

author: Cox Media Group National Content Desk
title: Bacon poses same cancer risk as cigarettes, world health group... | www.ajc.com
text:
A World Health Organization (WHO) agency will issue a warning Monday linking bacon and other processed meats to a cancer risk as high as that posed by cigarettes, according to reports .
WHO’s International Agency for Research on Cancer (IARC) will release their findings in Monday’s edition of The Lancet Oncology , according to the reports.
News of the pending report sparked criticism from industries that could be affected by the news.
Even before the report was released, a spokesperson for the National Cattlemen’s Beef Association said there’s no scientific data to show a causal link between cancer and meat.
